> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): I would like to use Linux, but migration to it is not easy.I want to play games, i tried to install them, i failed.I wanted to migrate my torrent application data, settings, i failed, because paths in configuration files are different and search and replace in files somehow not worked.

For me, I start playing games when I just start using Linux. So all my Steam library is linux compatible. I would have an opposite situation where migrating back to Windows would be difficult.
